languages.text:
Whenever the wearer uses a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, they can trigger one of the following:
-<indent=5%>50% chance to reduce the {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} cost and decrease {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} by −2.</indent>
-<indent=5%>25% chance to perform the psychic power as usual.</indent>
-<indent=5%>25% chance to increase veil degradation by +3 and reset the {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of their attack.</indent>
If veil degradation is increased to 15 or beyond, this effect triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g} even when using minor psychic powers.

traits.locale_text:
Whenever the wearer uses a psychic power, they can trigger one of the following:
-<indent=5%>50% chance to reduce the AP cost and veil degradation of their psychic powers to 0 and reset the cooldown of those abilities.</indent>
-<indent=5%>25% chance to perform the psychic power as usual.</indent>
-<indent=5%>5% chance to consume 2 additional AP, increase veil degradation by +3, reduce the cost of all the wearer's psychic powers to 0 AP, and reset the cooldown of that psychic power. If veil degradation is increased to 15 or beyond, this effect triggers perils of the warp even when using minor psychic powers.</indent>

Whenever the wearer uses a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, they can trigger one of the following:
-<indent=5%>50% chance to reduce the {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} cost and decrease {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} by −2.</indent>
-<indent=5%>25% chance to perform the psychic power as usual.</indent>
-<indent=5%>25% chance to increase veil degradation by +3 and reset the {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of their attack.</indent>
If veil degradation is increased to 15 or beyond, this effect triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g} even when using minor psychic powers.

Whenever wielder uses a psy-power, they have:
- 50% chance to restore AP cost of this ability and Veil Tear by 2
- 25% chance to perform this psy power as usual
- 25% chance to increase Veil Tear by 3 and remove cooldown from attack.
If Veil Tear is increased to 15 or beyond this effect will trigger Peril of the Warp even on minor power

languages.text:
每当装备者使用灵能力量时，都会随机触发下列其中一项效果：
- <indent=5%>50%几率降低{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}耗费，并使{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}障壁恶化{/g}程度降低2点。</indent>
- <indent=5%>25%几率正常施展灵能力量，不会触发额外效果。</indent>
- <indent=5%>25%几率使障壁恶化提高3点，并重置刚刚释放的灵能力量的冷却时间。</indent>如果障壁恶化程度至少为15点，触发此{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}会触发{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}亚空间的威胁{/g}，即便是次要灵能力量也会触发亚空间的威胁。
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer uses a psychic power, they can trigger one of the following:
-<indent=5%>50% chance to reduce the {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} cost and decrease {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} by −2.</indent>
-<indent=5%>25% chance to perform the psychic power as usual.</indent>
-<indent=5%>25% chance to increase veil degradation by +3 and reset the cooldown of their attack.</indent>
If veil degradation is increased to 15 or beyond, this {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g} even when using minor psychic powers.

traits.locale_text:
当装备者使用灵能力量时，会随机触发下列其中一项效果：
- <indent=5%>50%几率使所有{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}灵能能力{/g}不再消耗任何{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}，也不再提高{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}障壁恶化{/g}程度，并重置{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}冷却时间{/g}。</indent>
- <indent=5%>25%几率正常施展灵能力量，不会触发额外效果。</indent>
- <indent=5%>25%几率额外消耗2点行动点数，使障壁恶化提高3点，使装备者所有灵能力量不再消耗任何行动点数，并重置刚刚释放的灵能力量的冷却时间。如果障壁恶化程度至少为15点，触发此{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}会触发{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}亚空间的威胁{/g}，即便是次要灵能力量也会触发亚空间的威胁。</indent>

languages.text:
Применяя {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосилу{/g}, персонаж может получить один из следующих эффектов:
-<indent=5%>50% вероятности снизить затраты {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и ослабить {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}истончение завесы{/g} на 2.</indent>
-<indent=5%>25% вероятности применить психосилу обычным образом.</indent>
-<indent=5%>25% вероятности усилить истончение завесы на 3 и завершить {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}период восстановления{/g} своей атаки.</indent>
Если истончение завесы равно 15 или выше, этот эффект вызывает {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}угрозы варпа{/g} даже при применении малых психосил.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer uses a psychic power, they can trigger one of the following:
-<indent=5%>50% chance to reduce the AP cost and veil degradation of their psychic powers to 0 and reset the cooldown of those abilities.</indent>
-<indent=5%>25% chance to perform the psychic power as usual.</indent>
-<indent=5%>25% chance to consume 2 additional AP, increase veil degradation by +3, reduce the cost of all the wearer's psychic powers to 0 AP, and reset the cooldown of that psychic power. If veil degradation is increased to 15 or beyond, this effect triggers perils of the warp even when using minor psychic powers.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Применяя психосилу, персонаж может получить один из следующих эффектов:
-<indent=5%>50% вероятности снизить затраты ОД и истончение завесы при применении психосил до 0 и завершить период восстановления этих способностей.</indent>
-<indent=5%>25% вероятности применить психосилу обычным образом.</indent>
-<indent=5%>25% вероятности потратить 2 ОД дополнительно, усилить истончение завесы на 3, снизить затраты ОД всех психосил до 0 и завершить период восстановления этой психосилы. Если истончение завесы равно 15 или выше, этот эффект вызывает угрозы варпа даже при применении малых психосил.</indent>

Применяя психосилу, персонаж может получить один из следующих эффектов:
-<indent=5%>50% вероятности снизить затраты ОД и истончение завесы при применении психосил до 0 и завершить период восстановления этих способностей.</indent>
-<indent=5%>25% вероятности применить психосилу обычным образом.</indent>
-<indent=5%>25% вероятности потратить 2 ОД дополнительно, усилить истончение завесы на 3, снизить затраты ОД всех психосил до 0 и завершить период восстановления этой психосилы. Если истончение завесы равно 15 или выше, этот эффект вызывает угрозы варпа даже при применении малых психосил.</indent>

languages.text:
使用者が超能力を使用するたびに、次の1つを発動することができる：
-<indent=5%>50%の確率で{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}コストを下げ、{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}ヴェールの劣化{/g}を -2減少する。</indent>
-<indent=5%>25%の確率で通常通りに超能力を発動する。</indent>
-<indent=5%>25%の確率で追加APを2消費し、ヴェールの劣化を +3増加し、使用者の超能力すべてのコストを0APに減らし、その超能力のクールダウンをリセットする。
ヴェールの劣化が15以上に増加した場合、この{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}により、弱い超能力を使用しているときであっても、{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}危険な<歪み>{/g}を発動する。</indent>
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer uses a psychic power, they can trigger one of the following:
-<indent=5%>50% chance to reduce the {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} cost and decrease {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} by −2.</indent>
-<indent=5%>25% chance to perform the psychic power as usual.</indent>
-<indent=5%>25% chance to increase veil degradation by +3 and reset the cooldown of their attack.</indent>
If veil degradation is increased to 15 or beyond, this {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g} even when using minor psychic powers.

traits.locale_text:
使用者が超能力を使用するたびに、次の1つを発動することができる：
-<indent=5%>50%の確率で{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}コストを下げ、{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}ヴェールの劣化{/g}を -2減少する。
-<indent=5%>25%の確率で通常通りに超能力を発動する。</indent>
-<indent=5%>25%の確率で追加APを2消費し、ヴェールの劣化を +3増加し、使用者の超能力すべてのコストを0APに減らし、その超能力のクールダウンをリセットする。
ヴェールの劣化が15以上に増加した場合、この{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}により、弱い超能力を使用しているときであっても、{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}危険な<歪み>{/g}を発動する。</indent>

languages.text:
Cada vez que el portador use un poder psíquico, puede activar un efecto de los siguientes:
-<indent=5%>50 % de probabilidad de reducir el coste de {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} y la {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}degradación del velo{/g} en −2.</indent>
-<indent=5%>25 % de probabilidad de usar su poder psíquico como habitualmente.</indent>
-<indent=5%>25 % de probabilidad de aumentar la degradación de velo en +3 y reiniciar el tiempo de recuperación de su ataque.</indent>
Si la degradación del velo aumenta a 15 o más, este {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} activa las {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}fatalidades de la disformidad{/g} incluso al usar poderes psíquicos menores.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer uses a psychic power, they can trigger one of the following:
-<indent=5%>50% chance to reduce the {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} cost and decrease {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} by −2.</indent>
-<indent=5%>25% chance to perform the psychic power as usual.</indent>
-<indent=5%>25% chance to increase veil degradation by +3 and reset the cooldown of their attack.</indent>
If veil degradation is increased to 15 or beyond, this {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g} even when using minor psychic powers.

traits.locale_text:
Cada vez que el portador use un poder psíquico, puede activar un efecto de los siguientes:
-<indent=5%>50 % de probabilidad de reducir el coste de {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} y la {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}degradación del velo{/g} en -2.</indent>
-<indent=5%>25 % de probabilidad de usar su poder psíquico como habitualmente.</indent>
-<indent=5%>25 % de probabilidad de aumentar la degradación de velo en +3 y reiniciar el tiempo de recuperación de su ataque.</indent>
Si la degradación del velo aumenta a 15 o más, este {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} activa las {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}fatalidades de la disformidad{/g} incluso al usar poderes psíquicos menores.

languages.text:
Immer wenn der Träger eine psionische Kraft nutzt, kann er einen der folgenden Effekte auslösen:
-<indent=5%>Chance von 50 % auf Verringern der {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}-Kosten und des {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Zerfalls des Schleiers{/g} um −2.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Chance von 25 % auf gewöhnliches Ausführen der psionischen Kraft.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Chance von 25 % auf Erhöhung des Zerfalls des Schleiers um +3 und Zurücksetzen der Abklingzeit des Angriffs.</indent>
Erhöht sich der Zerfall des Schleiers auf 15 oder mehr, löst dieser {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}Effekt{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}Gefahren des Warp{/g} aus, auch beim Einsatz von sekundären psionischen Kräften.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer uses a psychic power, they can trigger one of the following:
-<indent=5%>50% chance to reduce the {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} cost and decrease {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} by −2.</indent>
-<indent=5%>25% chance to perform the psychic power as usual.</indent>
-<indent=5%>25% chance to increase veil degradation by +3 and reset the cooldown of their attack.</indent>
If veil degradation is increased to 15 or beyond, this {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g} even when using minor psychic powers.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn der Träger eine psionische Kraft nutzt, kann er einen der folgenden Effekte auslösen: -<indent=5%>Chance von 50 % auf Verringern der {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}-Kosten und des {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Zerfalls des Schleiers{/g} um −2</indent> -<indent=5%>Chance von 25 % auf gewöhnliches Ausführen der psionischen Kraft</indent> -<indent=5%>Chance von 25 % auf Erhöhung des Zerfalls des Schleiers um +3 und Zurücksetzen der Abklingzeit des Angriffs</indent> Erhöht sich der Zerfall des Schleiers auf 15 oder mehr, löst dieser {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}Gefahren des Warp{/g} aus, auch beim Einsatz von sekundären psionischen Kräften.

languages.text:
Chaque fois que l'utilisateur a recours à un pouvoir psychique, il peut déclencher l'un des effets suivants :
-<indent=5%>50 % de chances de réduire le coût en {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} et de réduire la {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}dégradation du Voile{/g} de −2</indent>
-<indent=5%>25 % de chances d'exécuter le pouvoir psychique comme d'habitude</indent>
-<indent=5%>25 % de chances d'augmenter la dégradation du Voile de +3 et de réinitialiser le délai de récupération de l'attaque</indent>
Si la dégradation du Voile atteint une valeur supérieure ou égale à 15, cet {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} déclenche des {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}périls du Warp{/g}, même en cas d'utilisation de pouvoirs mineurs.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer uses a psychic power, they can trigger one of the following:
-<indent=5%>50% chance to reduce the {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} cost and decrease {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} by −2.</indent>
-<indent=5%>25% chance to perform the psychic power as usual.</indent>
-<indent=5%>25% chance to increase veil degradation by +3 and reset the cooldown of their attack.</indent>
If veil degradation is increased to 15 or beyond, this {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g} even when using minor psychic powers.

traits.locale_text:
Chaque fois que l'utilisateur a recours à un pouvoir psychique, il peut déclencher l'un des effets suivants :
- <indent=5%>50 % de chances de réduire le coût en {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} et la {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}dégradation du voile{/g} de ses {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}pouvoirs psychiques{/g} à 0 et de réinitialiser le {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}délai de récupération{/g} de ces {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g}.</indent>
- <indent=5%>25 % de chances d'exécuter le pouvoir psychique comme d'habitude.</indent>
- <indent=5%>25 % de chances d'utiliser 2 PA supplémentaires, d'augmenter la dégradation du voile de +3, de réduire le coût de tous les pouvoirs psychiques de l'utilisateur à 0 PA et de réinitialiser le délai de récupération de ce pouvoir psychique. Si la dégradation du voile atteint une valeur supérieure ou égale à 15, cet {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} déclenche des {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}périls du Warp{/g}, même si les pouvoirs psychiques utilisés sont mineurs.</indent>

Chaque fois que l'utilisateur a recours à un pouvoir psychique, il peut déclencher l'un des effets suivants :-<indent=5%>50 % de chances de réduire le coût en {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} et de réduire la {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}dégradation du Voile{/g} de −2</indent>-<indent=5%>25 % de chances d'exécuter le pouvoir psychique comme d'habitude</indent> -<indent=5%>25 % de chances d'augmenter la dégradation du Voile de +3 et de réinitialiser le délai de récupération de l'attaque</indent> Si la dégradation du Voile atteint une valeur supérieure ou égale à 15, cet {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} déclenche des {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}périls du Warp{/g}, même en cas d'utilisation de pouvoirs mineurs.
